reference_summary:
Yawamica 15 Pairs 6D Mink Eyelashes Faux 20MM Lashes Fluffy Cat Eye Wispy False Eyelashes Thick Dramatic Fake Eyelashes Handmade Reusable Natural Look Eyelashes Pack Long Eye Lashes Yawamica {'Brand': 'Yawamica', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Package Dimensions': '8.9 x 8.3 x 0.5 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} I ordered two different lashes from this company so this review might be duplicated.

Both sets of lashes are so sexy and very easy to apply. They take glue very well and very easy to clean (I just pick the glue off them). These are definitely reusable which is honestly my favorite part about them.

The lashes offer slightly different sizes within their packs so please look before you pick. My only complaint is that it’s hard for me to tell which lash goes to with which lash because of the placement of the lashes. So this leads to me having to put a lash back after realizing it’s not the right lash.

Beside that the lashes are fantastic and I would recommend them. So cute but confusing AISI QUEENS Curly Bob Wig Short Ombre Brown Wig for Black Women Kinky Hair Middle Part Heat Resistant Synthetic Hair Wig for Women 14inch AISI QUEENS {'Hair Type': 'Coily', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'AISI QUEENS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.71 x 8.9 x 2.72 inches; 9.14 Ounces'} This such a beautiful soft wig. I love the color and length. The cap has 3 combs two in the front and one in the back. The wig does have come with a very tiny piece of lace that you will have to cut. The lace while dark in color when looking at it is very transparent. You do not get any parting space but the part you get (middle part) is a decent length.

The wig is very manageable doesn’t do too much shedding (it hasn’t shed at all). The wig is synthetic so I wouldn’t recommend adding direct heat to it. If you want to style it use steam. Once the lace is cut the wig is ready to wear. She is cute MICPANG Electric Eyebrow Trimmer Precision Electric Eyebrow Razor for Women Battery-Operated Facial Hair Remover with Comb (Pink) MICPANG {'Package Dimensions': '7.28 x 2.64 x 0.94 inches; 1.13 Ounces'} The product hardly works and it drains the battery you put in it so quickly. I haven’t even used it for 15 minutes and the fresh battery I put in it is completely DRAINED!

I’m not a fan of this product so all I can say is buy it at your own risk. NO COLORGRAM Artist Formula Auto Brow Pencil 0.25g- True Beauty K-Drama Makeup, Built-in-Spoolie, Clump-Free Formula, Softly Glides, Natural Look (02 Natural Brown) COLORGRAM ["Featuring a unique, triangular tip, Brow Definer's retractable pencil design is ideal for outlining and filling your brows in one fluid motion. The custom spooley end is created with a precise width and firmness to seamlessly blend color."] {'Brand': 'COLORGRAM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.71 x 6.1 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I have a love hate relationship with this eyebrow tool.

Pros
• I like the Color
• The Spooly is nice it’s so soft
• Very easy to hold
• Sits on your eyebrow decently
• Seems to be smudge proof

Cons
• Too dang smudge proof if you mess up you will not be able to take it off unless you use a makeup remover. So my advice have your concealer on deck or do your eyebrows before you do any other part of your face because you’ll be taken off whatever you put on with this
• You’ll have to apply some pressure to get anything off dark enough
• The tip isn’t as precise as what I’m used to using which is why it’ll cause you to mess up a bit.

I like it but I’m not in like with it. I don’t really see myself reaching for this unless it’s all I have on hand. It’s ok MAEPEOR Black Glossy Lipgloss Black Nourishing Plumping Lip Gloss Luscious-colors Non-Sticky Shine Glossy Lipgloss MAEPEOR {'Brand': 'MAEPEOR', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Softening,Smoothening,Shine,Cold,Nourishing,Moisturizing,Gentle,Makeup', 'Specialty': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Pros
• Moisturizes your lips well
• Good coverage
• Matches photo colors perfectly
• Colors look good on lighter and darker skin tones
• Colors are versatile
• The Gloss is amazing

Cons
• Lied about where it’s actually made
• Doesn’t plump (only applies if you are interested)
• Sticky
• Definitely doesn’t last long
• Once it’s gone it’s gone no color will be left behind on your lips (which sucks because i love the tint of stained lips)

Would I recommend? Honestly I would but it would likely be if my top 5 favorites are sold out situation It’s nice while it lasts TOP GIRL 30 Inch Ocean Wave Crochet Hair Pack of 3 Ombre Blonde Deep Wave Crochet Hair Extensions Curls curly Wavy Braids Braiding Twist for Black Women Top Girl {'Brand': 'Top Girl', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '30 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '30 x 3 x 2 inches; 14.07 Ounces'} The quality is absolute trash, its very stringy, it sheds, the hair feels like weird elastic. Washing does not help it still feels awful. it looks exactly it feels terrible. EWWW
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a strong inclination towards false eyelashes and versatile hair solutions, with a recent focus on lip products. Their exploration of hair options has shifted to a critical perspective following a disappointing experience with synthetic hair extensions, reinforcing their commitment to quality over quantity.

- **Material Preference:** They continue to prioritize cruelty-free and ethical beauty products, emphasizing sustainability across skincare, grooming, and makeup.

- **Usage Pattern:** The desire for reusable and low-maintenance items persists, aligning with their sustainable mindset. However, their recent encounter with low-quality hair extensions has introduced a more cautious approach in their beauty product experimentation.

- **Buying Behavior:** The user's discerning nature in purchases has become more pronounced. After a negative experience, particularly with hair extensions, they are now more vigilant about ensuring product effectiveness and quality in all categories, including makeup and grooming tools.

- **Quality Expectations:** High-quality, effective, and user-friendly products are paramount. Their scrutiny has increased, heavily influenced by prior dissatisfaction, especially with hair-related products.

- **Design Sensitivity:** Aesthetic appeal and functionality in product design remain significant priorities, though recent experiences have led to a sharper focus on reliability.

- **General Sentiment:** While enthusiasm for aesthetically pleasing and practical beauty products endures, recent disappointments have emphasized the need for reliability and effectiveness in their choices, particularly in hair and grooming tools.
